manifest.name: @hapi/validate
manifest.readme: # @hapi/validate A fork of the [**joi**](https://github.com/sideway/joi) validation library for internal hapi core needs only. This fork is maintained to keep the hapi framework 100% free of external dependencies. It is not meant to be used outside of hapi core modules. Please use the official [**joi**](https://github.com/sideway/joi) library.
